scripts.build: yarn clean && gulp && yarn build:icon-component && yarn build:compile
scripts.build:icon-component: yarn svgr --template template.js lib/ui_icons_svgs --out-dir lib/ui_icons && node scripts/build_index.js
scripts.build:compile: BABEL_ENV=esm yarn babel lib --out-dir es && BABEL_ENV=node yarn babel lib --out-dir lib
scripts.clean:src: yarn rimraf scripts src gulpfile.js README.md template.js .svgrrc .npmignore .github
